data.text:
@AnkitKhandelwal I'm very sorry but you may have to advise your agent to submit it on their system as we are unable to force them to do so.
They will have to initiate this in their system directly. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@AnkitKhandelwal I'm afraid that they will have to do that in their system directly. Travel agent will have to submit the authorization request directly there and have it approved by system, we do not accept passenger request directly as we would not intervene their refund handling. -Vinci

data.text:
🗣 #倫敦 #希斯路 #LHR （香港時間 4月14日 21:45）

希斯路機場將關閉三號航站樓。國泰航空的航班由4月16日（星期四）起將改為從二號航站樓升降。專屬登機櫃檯位於二號航站樓A區A1-A6號。更多資訊，請瀏覽👇https://t.co/uiZHy4477a

data.text:
🗣 #London #Heathrow #LHR (14:30/14APR GMT+1)

All Cathay Pacific operations at #Heathrow will move to Terminal 2 wef 16Apr (Thur) due closure of Terminal 3. Our new dedicated counters are located in A1-A6 Zone A Terminal 2. More info 👇 https://t.co/w4JbDtzzwX
@Zo_NDO We have never received your DM. You may DM us for assistance. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text:
In these challenging times, we must stay strong and resilient as we strive to #MoveBeyond the horizon, and on to new journeys, soon.  #WeAreInThisTogether 
 
Credit: Instagram@vdubl https://t.co/OwSr7h3UCK
@HeatherGin @Travel2be If your ticket is issued with travel agent, you may have to contact them for assistance. -Vinci
@kvnchhr Sorry that we would not be able to extend the validity of appreciation card. -Vinci

@Karthik83756584 To protect your privacy, we recommend you to delete your personal ticket number from public tweet.
-Vinci
@AndyTart @iangibbonsr @UKinVietnam @FCOtravel Hi there, passengers are no longer permitted to transit through Hong Kong International Airport. -Vinci

@aegithali Hi there, cx543/apr22 is cancelled. We are sorry that passengers are no longer permitted to transit through Hong Kong International Airport due to government policy. You may check here for more details: https://t.co/6JcWKxXKXh Thank you! - Liz
@AC_BHL Hi Ann, we are still processing the refund, please note that it will take around 6-8 weeks to process the refund -Elsa
@myfamiliamusica Hi there, for miles refund, please contact Asia Miles for further assist -Elsa

@chiragmadhani @cathaypacificIN Please advise your travel agent to contact agency sales team or helpdesk for further assistance - they will know how to work on it.
-Ella

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @verityfaye We have received a large increase in refund requests as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. We apologise for any delays and thank you for your patience during this busy period. It could take up to 45 calendar days. -Ella

@ChantelleEvan14 Hi there, we are sorry that there is no special ticketing arrangement for flights in July at the moment. Only if your ticket was issued on/before 23 March *2020; and your original travel period is from 17 March to 31 May 2020, cancellation fee will be waived. -Liz
@d17studio Hi there, may you share your eTicket number and passenger name to us through DM so we can check it for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@paulreno21 Hi Paul, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Marnakr We have reduced capacity for Apr and May. You may always refer to https://t.co/uENOmHnKtf for latest updates. -Vinci
@JessieeeeeH You can DM us with passenger full name and eTicket number so we can have a look. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @Marnakr As we are based in Hong Kong, people travelling from Cambodia to South Africa will have to transit via Hong Kong and we are unable to offer any direct flight. -Vinci
@Blanche20832707 Transiting via Hong Kong is not permitted. You can refer to https://t.co/oOTkZvrDOl -Vinci
@KushUpp @cathaypacificIN We see that the ticket was purchased through a third party. Please kindly contact them directly for assistance. - Chloe

@BenedictJoson Hi there, as team received a large volume of refund request, it may take longer time as usual, up to 8 weeks. May you share your eTicket number and passenger name to us through DM so we can check it for you?  - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @warriorgirl_ Hi there, we have checked that the refund amount has been returned to your account on 2Apr. May you please double check with your bank please? Thank you! - Liz

@vivekc17 Hi there, since refund must be done by the issuing agency, if your ticket is not issued by us, you will need to contact your issuing agent for the refund request. Thanks for your understanding! - Liz
@5959gayoung Please kindly provide us with your eTicket no and full name in DM - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@wylie_tom @Skyscanner Unfortunately, both of them are invalid. Can you please send us a DM through the link so we can further assist you on this? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@wylie_tom @Skyscanner Can you please share your 13-digit eTicket no and full name in DM so we can further assist? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@_maravillarin You're welcome :) - Chloe
@_maravillarin Please share your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@PRIYANKSAVLA9 May we now if you can contact us through DM again please? Many thanks.  - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@agnescb Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@papini_sabrina Hi Sabrina, we have received large amount of request recently, please allow 6-8 weeks for the refund process. Thank you. -Joy

We hope you’re staying healthy and practicing #socialdistancing. Here’s a word search to keep you entertained. Let us know if you’ve found all seven #aviation terms hidden in this word search! https://t.co/HIZzRAcmLa
@mrkjms82 Hi Mark, mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna
@alfredohuang Hi there, please send us PM with your eTicket number, passenger’s full name and email address so we can check for you. Thank you. -Joy https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@paul_ph7design Hi Paul, mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@rochelleannpad1 Mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@rochelleannpad1 If you itinerary involve US sectors, it would take seven working days. Otherwise it could take up to 45 calendar days - Holly 2/2

data.text: @rochelleannpad1 Hi there, we have received a large increase in refund requests as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. Whilst we will do everything we can to process your refund quickly, this process may take longer than normal. - Holly 1/2

data.text:
Our resolve and willpower will get us through the toughest, most seemingly impossible situations. As long as we stay strong and stand as one, we're confident we will be able to #MoveBeyond these challenges together.
 
Credit: Instagram@lester318 https://t.co/n1S1LUCzHa

Even in challenging times, we're committed to our role: connecting the world. Our Cargo team is working around the clock to fly personal protective equipment, medicine, food, and more to HongKong and the rest of the world. Adapting to life's ups and downs - that's the #HK spirit. https://t.co/fx65YOZXM0
@lukeyc888 @Skyscanner Already reached you out in DM. -Vinci

data.text:
@lukeyc888 @Skyscanner @qatarairways We're happy to feed this back to the concerned travel agent. Yet, we would not be able to help process the refund our end.
You can DM us the eTicket number and passenger name. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@lukeyc888 @Skyscanner I'm afraid that airline is unable to intervene. You may try to contact your agent via different channels. :( -Vinci

@lukeyc888 @Skyscanner If your flight is confirmed to be cancelled, you are eligible to request for refund.
If your ticket is issued with travel agent, you may have to contact them for assistance. -Vinci
@NikitaJadhav01 @goibibo Please contact your travel agent for checking. -Vinci
@NikitaJadhav01 @goibibo For ticket purchased from a travel agency, you'll need to contact them directly for the refund inquiry. - Chloe
@moodyjp @flightcentreAU The booking was canceled on 19 Feb according to the system. Please kindly contact your travel agent if you have any concerns regarding this. - Chloe
@moodyjp @flightcentreAU According to the booking that you have DM-ed us before, the booking was cancelled on 19Feb and the waiver was not issued yet so cancellation fee would be charged. -Vinci
@moodyjp @flightcentreAU May I know the date of the request for cancellation and refund? - Chloe

@moodyjp @flightcentreAU We are offering full refund to all destinations with travel period up to 31May20 and those tickets have to be issued on or before 23Mar20. However, travel agent may impose admin/service fees according to their T&C. You may check with them for more details. -Vinci
@StuInAus We're sorry to learn about that. Can you please let us know your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@SayedMo71872727 Hi there, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Yogi_Bhatt_ You may send your enquiry via https://t.co/E1wAZT9QiD
 -Ella

@Yogi_Bhatt_ Sorry that we are not in the best position to answer cargo's enquiry.
Please contact our Cargo team at +852 2747 7222 
9:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 6:30pm (Monday - Saturday)
9:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 6:30pm (Public holidays)
9:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 4:00pm (Sunday) 
 -Ella
@cryopolitics Hi Mia, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Tashpedia Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@whatuptkhere Can you please share your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@asdf1596324 Already reached out your DM. To protect your privacy, we recommend you to remove booking details from public tweet. -Vinci

data.text:
@kinsonMJ @SimonCalder @Expedia If ticket is issued with third party, you may have to contact them for assistance.
If flight is confirmed to be cancelled, you are eligible to apply for refund regardless of ticket type, however, your agent may charge you applicable admin/service fee. -Vinci

@tareenjak We're sorry about that. Your refund request has been placed successfully. Due to the high volume of the refund requests, the refund process will take longer than usual which can be up to 8 weeks. Thank your for bearing with us! - Chloe

@Yogi_Bhatt_ Hi Yogi, you may contact the Hong Kong Cargo team at +852 2747 7222 
9:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 6:30pm (Monday - Saturday)
9:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 6:30pm (Public holidays)
9:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 4:00pm (Sunday) -Joy

@MartinCox0155 Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@HeatherGin @Travel2be Hi Heather, as your ticket is issued with travel agent, we are afraid that you may contact your agent regarding refund status. -Vinci
@susavpradhan09 @MyTrip We see that your booking was made via a third party. Please kindly contact them directly for the refund follow-up. Thank you - Chloe

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

data.text: Our Chief Customer and Commercial Officer explains how we're bringing more flexibility for your journeys, as well as safeguarding yours and our crew's wellbeing. Thank you for your continuous support and we look forward to seeing you soon. Watch here: https://t.co/RQxsnPZHND https://t.co/IOul8Poddd
@TBoevink Hi Tiffany, could you reach out to us through DM so that we can help you with the refund? Thank you.
@BigMac151279 Hi there, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@_Madhumita Hi there, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@AngelaSterritt Hi Angela, could you DM us with your travel details so that we can look into it and help you with this? Thanks.
@adrian02765712 Hi there, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@pippaS123 Hi there, could you please DM us with your travel details and e-ticket number so that we can get started on this? Thanks
@KeithConway17 Hi Keith, thank you for sharing. This is actually not available to purchase through our website - perhaps the travel agency has not yet updated their site. Hope this helps.
@verityfaye Hello, we can help you process the refund here. Please send us your e-ticket number and travel information through DM and we will take it from there. Thank you.
@KeithConway17 Hi Keith, could you kindly share with us the flight in question so that we may look into it? Thank you.
@amorillum Hi Anita, sure. Please send us your travel details and e-ticket number(s) in DM and we'll help you get started with this. Thank you.
